column4: Please forgive me if this is a stupid question.  Is there any way to take part of a big (bit torrent) file that one bit torrent client has started and give it to another client to finish?
yes, it should be, just stop the 1st torrent client, start the 2nd client and give it the same torrent file and the same download folder.
clients usually look for what already exists, and then verify how much of it matches the hashes in the torrent file.
the file so far:  Is this the file stored in Ubuntu's "Downloads" folder, that Properties says is already full size?  Or do I need to find the Transmission operating folder to get the part file?
